name: ALIEN AI (itch)
description:
Compete against an evolving AI that adapts to your playstyle! Your opponent is an intelligent machine learning algorithm. It begins with no prior knowledge of the game or its objectives but quickly learns to chase you, anticipate your movements, and dodge your attacks. Can you stay one step ahead of the swarm?

Upgrade your ship with lasers, shields, warp drives, and more! Withstand the swarm's onslaught with armor and shields, fight back with bombs and lasers, or dodge their attacks by manipulating time and space! What will you choose?

Code, art, sfx, and music by Andrew Charters

Button prompts by Nicolae (Xelu) Berbece
